page.title: 03A DOCTOR'S DAY: PART 1
page.content: On a Monday morning a Senior House Officer must be at Airedale Hospital by 8.30am.He immediately goes to the Labour Room which is in the Maternity Section to see whether any patients need attention and he attends to them. At 9.00am he goes to the Operating Theatre.There are many doctors and nurses.Some of them are the running nurse,surgeon,anaesthatist,scrub nurse and a backup surgeon.He stays there till 12am and has his dinner there.At 2pm he goes to the Maternity clinic till 5pm.He keeps his bleep ready in case there is an emergency. On a Tuesday morning he talks to the patients in his two wards and looks at their progress on their charts. At noon he has his dinner . {(Continued on P4). }
